nodes.text: This species was a sentient species that possessed a green heart with eight valves that pumped mercury. This species also had multiple mouths and chloroplasts and its method of locomotion was through sliding.
A member of this species once wrote the song "If Only I Could Let Go and Cry."

This species was mentioned in the song "If Only I Could Let Go and Cry" appeared in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a 1993 book that combines creature designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects with original text written by Bob Carrau. In it, a sheet music and its lyrics are provided with an image of the all-Bith band Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
